components.defaultValue:
=([
        {x: "USE", data1: $d(parent).gwp_use_ratio}, 
        {x: "ERROR", data1: $d(parent).gwp_error_ratio},
        {x: "MANUFACTURING", data1: $d(parent).gwp_manufacturing_ratio},
        {x: "TRANSPORT", data1: $d(parent).gwp_transport_ratio},
        {x: "EOL", data1: $d(parent).gwp_eol_ratio},
        {x: "SSD", data1: $d(parent).gwp_ssd_ratio},
        {x: "MAINBOARD", data1: $d(parent).gwp_mainboard_ratio},
        {x: "DAUGHTERBOARD", data1: $d(parent).gwp_daughterboard_ratio},
        {x: "ENCLOSURE", data1: $d(parent).gwp_enclosure_ratio}
])
